lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, a capsule summary on Monday for a sports article about Darren Chiacchia, an elite rider who has been recovering from life-threatening injuries sustained at an equestrian program last March, misidentified the type competition in which he was hurt. It was a program known as eventing — not “the sport of dressage,” which is one portion of eventing, along with cross-country riding and show-jumping.
